trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around October 5th 1975
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and i were at a drive-in theatre around belleville illinois near scott AFB sometime between late1974 and early 1976. it may have been centered around the october 1975 sightings in that area. The ,movie was " last tango in paris. About a half hour into the movie one or more objects startet dashing back and forth across the sky at high velocities and seemingly high altitudes. Eventually they turned off the screen so everone could see better. At least a hundred people saw this. Everone got out of their cars to watch. Soon several jets appeared and chased them off to the northnwest. The action was all to the west, mover the screen, end seemed to move north and south. I've often thought of this over the years but have never seen any press on it. I need to findnout the dates the movie was playing at a drive-in in that area to further nail down the timeframe.
